history.content:
EECS and LSCS Students,

 

On behalf of both the UC Berkeley EECS department and Apple, we'd like to invite you to a special virtual event to learn more about our ongoing joint hardware education initiative. Learn more about EECS courses with exciting class hardware projects with experienced industry feedback, as well as scholarships, fellowships, internships, and careers in Integrated Circuit (IC) engineering and computer architecture. You’re not going to want to miss this.

 

Please note that the scholarship and fellowship websites will be open for applications on 8/16.

 

Let's reimagine your future together. Please view the attached flyer and register today. 

 

Best,

Berkeley EECS and the Apple Team

Berkeley_EECS_AppleY2.pdf

Please also see info on Fellowship Opportunities:

Flyer_Berkeley_PhD_Fellowship_Y2_Final.pdf

Flyer_Berkeley_Masters_Scholarship_Y2_Final.pdf
